extension.name: Magic Slideshow module for Joomla 1.6
extension.author: MagicToolbox
extension.description: Magic Slideshow<sup>™</sup> lets you display one image after another in rotation. It's easy to install and customise on your website. Try out some customisation options http://www.magictoolbox.com/magicslideshow/integration/. By http://www.magictoolbox.com/.

field.name: container-size
field.label: Size of thumbnail container (pixels)
field.description: 0 - auto

field.name: container-position
field.label: Container position
field.description: Position of thumbnail container

field.name: container-opacity
field.label: Container opacity
field.description: Opacity of thumbnail container

field.name: container-padding
field.label: Container padding
field.description: Padding between container and slideshow (pixels)

field.name: container-speed
field.label: Container speed
field.description: Speed that thumbnails move (pixles per second)

field.name: message
field.label: Message under Slideshow
field.description: use 'none' value instead empty

field.name: links-window
field.label: Page where a link should load

field.name: preserve
field.label: Preserve image sizes
field.description: Use original image proportions or stretch them to same size

field.name: start
field.label: Starting image number
field.description: Choose which image to start slideshow at

field.name: z-index
field.label: Starting z-Index
field.description: Adjust the stack position above/below other elements

field.name: loading-text
field.label: Loading text
field.description: Display text with the loading icon (empty by default)

field.name: width
field.label: Slideshow width (pixels)
field.description: 0 - auto

field.name: height
field.label: Slideshow height (pixels)
field.description: 0 - auto

field.name: loop
field.label: Restart slideshow type
field.description: Restart slideshow after last image

field.name: loop-type
field.label: Loop type
field.description: Continue to next image or slide all the way back

field.name: speed
field.label: Slideshow speed
field.description: Change the slide speed in seconds (0 = manual)

field.name: text
field.label: Text shows
field.description: Display text always or give it an effect

field.name: text-delay
field.label: Text shows delay
field.description: Delay before the text effect starts

field.name: text-opacity
field.label: Text opacity
field.description: Opacity of text and background

field.name: text-effect
field.label: Text effect
field.description: Choice of text effects

field.name: text-position
field.label: Text position
field.description: Position of text (must be different to 'container-position')

field.name: fix_css_file
field.label: Fix css file?
field.description: Only use this if you know the consequences! Select 'Fix' to fix css file the next time the module is loaded.
